metadata.title: CVE-2018-20348 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libpff_item_tree_create_node in libpff_item_tree.c in libpff beforeexperimental-20180714 allows attackers to cause a denial of service(infinite recursion) via a crafted file, related tolibfdata_tree_get_node_value in libfdata_tree.c.

criterions.comment: libpff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
